resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108677</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108677</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What Are We Fighting for Over There? Perspectives on the Great War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kämpfen wir für dort? Perspektiven auf
dem großen Krieg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que combattons-nous pour là-bas ? 
Perspectives sur la grande guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que nós estamos lutando por sobre lá? 
Perspectives na guerra grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa siamo Combattimento per là? 
Prospettive sulla guerra grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι παλεύουμε για εκεί; Προοπτικές στο μεγάλο 
πόλεμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué estamos luchando para allá? 
Perspectivas en la gran guerra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a unit in which students use primary documents to develop an understanding of the World War I era, including how the U.S. prepared for and participated in the war and how the war foreshadowed the role of the U.S. as a world power of the 20th century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist enthält eine Maßeinheit, in der 
Kursteilnehmer Primärbenutzen dokumente, um ein Verständnis der 
Weltkriegära zu entwickeln und wie die VEREINIGTEN STAATEN, die für 
vorbereitet werden und am Krieg teilgenommen sind und wie der Krieg 
die Rolle der VEREINIGTEN STAATEN als Weltenergie des 20. Jahrhunderts
vorher andeutete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une unité dans laquelle les étudiants 
emploient les documents primaires pour développer un arrangement de 
l'ère de Première Guerre Mondiale, incluant pour comment les 
ETATS-UNIS préparés et participés à la guerre et comment la guerre
a annoncé le rôle des ETATS-UNIS comme puissance du monde du 20ème 
siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma unidade em que os estudantes usam originais
preliminares desenvolver uma compreensão da era do world.war.i, 
incluindo como os ESTADOS UNIDOS preparados para e participados na 
guerra e como a guerra foreshadowed o papel dos ESTADOS UNIDOS como 
uma potência do mundo do 20o século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un'unità in cui gli allievi usano i documenti 
primari per sviluppare una comprensione dell'era di world.war.i, 
includente come gli STATI UNITI per e partecipati alla guerra e come 
la guerra foreshadowed il ruolo degli STATI UNITI come potenza del 
mondo del ventesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια μονάδα στην οποία οι σπουδαστές 
χρησιμοποιούν τα αρχικά έγγραφα για να αναπτύξουν μια κατανόηση 
του παγκόσμιου πολέμου Ι εποχή, που περιλαμβάνει πώς οι ΗΠΑ 
προετοιμάστηκαν για και συμμετείχαν στον πόλεμο και πώς ο πόλεμος
προανήγγειλε το ρόλο των ΗΠΑ ως παγκόσμια δύναμη του 20ού αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una unidad en la cual los estudiantes utilizan 
documentos primarios para desarrollar una comprensión de la era de la
Primera Guerra Mundial, incluyendo para cómo los ESTADOS UNIDOS 
preparados y participados en la guerra y cómo la guerra presagió el 
papel de los ESTADOS UNIDOS como potencia del mundo del vigésimo 
siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108677</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/what-are-we-fighting-for-over-there-perspectives-on-the-great-war</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
